title: Deal of the Week: Microsoft Certified Solutions Developer: Windows Store Apps Using C#
text:
Deal of the Week: Microsoft Certified Solutions Developer: Windows Store Apps Using C# By Martin Brinkmann on September 15, 2015 in Deals - Last Update: September 15, 2015 0 
The deal of the week brings you another Microsoft e-learning package: Microsoft Certified Solutions Developer: Windows Store Apps Using C# is a three course bundle that teaches you C# programming and development of Windows Store applications. 
The three courses included in the bundle are: Microsoft 70-483: Programming in C# Microsoft 70-484: Essentials of Developing Windows Store Apps Using C# Microsoft 70-485: Advanced Windows Store App Development Using C# 
The first course acts as an introductory course to the C# programming language. Learn program structures, syntax, event handling and more. It prepares you for the MCSD 70-481 Exam so that you can take the exam if you want to for certification (not included in the bundle). 
The two remaining courses walk you through the steps of developing Windows apps. The first course covers the basics while the second dives deeper into advanced topics such as creating background tasks or managing security. Click here to open the Microsoft course bundle on Ghacks Deals The e-learning bundle is available for $49.99 instead of the standard price of $614. For that you gain access to all three courses.
